pony.events.Event

authors
AxGord
type
class


Constructor

new(?args : Array<Dynamic>)
Create new Event.
parameters
?args event arguments.

Instance Variables

abort : Bool

If set true, next listeners not excute. And not execute runAfter functions.

args(getArgs,setError) : Array<Dynamic>

Event arguments

listener : Listener

You can use this for change priority or another operation with Listener.

results : Hash<Dynamic>

Listeners results.

signal : Signal

stop : Bool

If set true, next listeners not execute.

target : Dynamic

Event target. Type Signal or EventDispatcher.

Instance Methods

arg(n : Int) : Dynamic

args[n] - Stupid Dynamic type :(.

removeListener() : Void

Remove this listener from this signal.

dynamic runAfter(f : Void -> Void) : Void

Add function for run after execute all listener.
parameters
f Function
